Button.onactivate: AddStyle( WelcomeTutorialDetail, Visible ); RemoveStyle( TutorialHub, Visible ); SetInputFocus(TutorialDetailBackWelcome);

AddStyle( HomeTutorialDetail, Visible ); RemoveStyle( TutorialHub, Visible ); SetInputFocus(TutorialDetailBackHome);
AddStyle( SavedTutorialDetail, Visible ); RemoveStyle( TutorialHub, Visible ); SetInputFocus(TutorialDetailBackSaved);
AddStyle( TutorialHub, Visible ); RemoveStyle( WelcomeTutorialDetail, Visible ); SetInputFocus(TutorialBack);

RemoveStyle( TutorialPage3, Visible ); HideDestinationsTutorial();
